column5: .        3 OF US HEADED OUT FROM THE HOUSE ABOUT 2PM                   ARRIVED AT OUR DESTINATION ABOUT 5 MINUTES LATER            DRILLED A FEW HOLES....HI 5s ALL ROUND                 JACK GOT TO WORK SCOOPING                      ROLOFF WANTED TO HELP TOO            JACK DECIDED TO FILL THE HOLE UP AGAIN...LOL...OH WELL                     WE SET A COUPLE OF LINES AND WENT FOR A SHORT WALK           EVERYONE HAD FUN IN THE DEEP SNOW                                  ROLOFF WENT CLIMBING                  WENT BACK TO DO SOME JIGGING           THE ONE THAT GOT AWAY!         TIGHT LINES ALL.   SIMON.
New camera Simon? Those are great shots.
Great photos Simon.  Tell Jack I love his shades

The 'fish eye' view shots are stills taken with my new Gopro Hero3. The pictures with the thin red borders are stills taken from GoPro video footage which i altered using windows picture program, the rest are with my older trusty canaon point and shoot.  Definitely a few giggles were had.  LOL...ijust told him and he went all shy and hid under a blanket on the couch...mind you its well past his bedtime.
What an amazing way to spend time with your boy and dog .... classic !
Jack looks like Kenny from South Park in some of those shots. You didn't kill him I hope.
I like the shots of Jack scooping, I'd blow those up and frame em if I was you!
